main.name: Bojan Vladov
main.description: Full-Stack Engineer Specializing in Video Streaming, WebRTC, and Blockchain
bio: Being full-stack web developer with various skill and stacks in both backend and frontend
Having many experiences in Video Streaming and WebRTC
Well-versed in Blockchain Networks including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance (Smart) Chain, EOS, Tron, Solana, Corda.
main.contactmessage: Please send me message if you will contact me!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: .NET and VoIP Engineer
description: • Designed and implemented the SIP/VoIP Web Phone with Angular12 and sip.js by using WebRTC.
• Designed and managed the database for PBX Server with MS SQL Server.
• Built and managed the sip server by customizing the Asterisk and configured the WebRTC endpoints and dial plans for both inbound and outbound.
• Implemented the web app for managing the PBX Server and dial plans, call information with ASP.NET and Blazor framework.

work.title: Frontend and Blockchain Engineer
description: • Contributed the ApeSwap Defi platform and created the smart contracts for DEX protocols.
• Created a compatible and custom UI Kit and major components with React.js and React Hook.
• Implemented the major features of DEX platform like trading, farming, staking by using React.js/Next.js and Web3.js.
• Created unit testing code for smart contracts and deployed the smart contracts to Ethereum, BSC, and Polygon.

work.title: Full-Stack Engineer
description: • Designed the structure of the live streaming server and implemented that with C++ and WebRTC.
• Contributed the frontend with React.js for Social Score platform with React and JavaScript.
• Designed and developed the microservices and RESTful APIs for web and mobile app of Social Score platform by using PHP/Laravel framework.
• Developed the mobile app for viewing live events of Social Score platform with Xamarin framework and .NET Core.

work.title: Frontend Developer
description: • Management the projects and consulting with clients.
• Develop the frontend with React, Vue, and Angular.
• Develop the mobile app for Android and iPhone.
